pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computation of High-Order Sobol' Sensitivity Indices // It allows to rapidly compute, bootstrap and plot up to third-order Sobol' indices using the estimators by Saltelli et al. 2010 doi:10.1016/j.cpc.2009.09.018 and Jansen 1999 doi:10.1016/S0010-4655(98)00154-4. The 'sensobol' package also implements the algorithm by Khorashadi Zadeh et al. 2017 doi:10.1016/j.envsoft.2017.02.001 to calculate the approximation error in the computation of Sobol' first and total indices, an approach that allows to robustly screen influential from non-influential model inputs. Finally, it also provides functions to obtain publication-ready figures of the model output uncertainty and sensitivity-related analysis.
